MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK8 postcode area of Stirling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:35pm. Our engineers are on their way to the Bayne Street substation to investigate a suspected blown fuse and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.45pm. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:06pm on Tuesday, 23 February 2021
